member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.DigitMaskPart
member.summary: Represents a single character, digit only mask part.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.MaskPart
member.summary: The abstract base class of all mask parts.
member.remarks: This class is not intended to be used directly.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.DigitMaskPart.ToString
member.summary: Returns the friendly name of the part.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.EnumerationMaskPart
member.summary: Represents a MaskPart object which accepts only a predefined set of options.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.EnumerationMaskPart.ToString
member.summary: Returns the friendly name of the part.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.EnumerationMaskPart.Items
member.summary: Gets the options collection of the part.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.FreeMaskPart
member.summary: Represents a single character MaskPart object which accepting any character.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.FreeMaskPart.ToString
member.summary: Returns the friendly name of the part.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.LiteralMaskPart
member.summary: Represents a multi character MaskPart whose content cannot be modified.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.LiteralMaskPart.ToString
member.summary: Returns the friendly name of the part.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.LiteralMaskPart.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the string that the LiteralMaskPart will render.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.LowerMaskPart
member.summary: Represents a single character MaskPart. The character is converted to lower upon input.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.LowerMaskPart.ToString
member.summary: Returns the friendly name of the part.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.MaskPartCollection
member.summary: Represents the collection of mask parts in a RadMaskedTextBox.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.MaskPartCollection.Add(Telerik.WebControls.MaskPart)
member.summary: Appends the specified MaskPart to the end of the collection.
member.param: The MaskPart to append to the collection.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.MaskPartCollection.Insert(System.Int32,Telerik.WebControls.MaskPart)
member.summary: Inserts the specified MaskPart in the collection at the specified index location.
member.param: The location in the collection to insert the MaskPart.
The MaskPart to add to the collection.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.MaskPartCollection.Contains(Telerik.WebControls.MaskPart)
member.summary: Determines whether the collection contains the specified item
member.returns: true if the collection contains the specified MaskPart; otherwise false.
member.param: The MaskPart to search for in the collection.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.MaskPartCollection.Remove(Telerik.WebControls.MaskPart)

summary.para: Removes the specified MaskPart from the collection.

member.param: The MaskPart to remove from the collection.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.MaskPartCollection.IndexOf(Telerik.WebControls.MaskPart)
member.summary: Determines the index value that represents the position of the specified MaskPart in the collection.
member.returns: The zero-based index position of the specified MaskPart in the collection.
member.param: A MaskPart to search for in the collection.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.MaskPartCollection.Owner
member.summary: Gets or sets the RadMaskedInputControl, which uses the collection.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.MaskPartCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a MaskPart at the specified index in the collection.
member.value: Use this indexer to get a MaskPart from the MaskPartCollection at the specified index, using array notation.
member.param: The zero-based index of the MaskPart to retrieve from the collection.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.NumericRangeMaskPart
member.summary: Represents a MaskPart which accepts numbers in a specified range.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.NumericRangeMaskPart.ToString
member.summary: Returns the friendly name of the part.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.NumericRangeMaskPart.LowerLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the smallest possible value the part can accept.
member.value: An integer representing the smallest acceptable number that the NumericRangeMaskPart can accept. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.NumericRangeMaskPart.UpperLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the largest possible value the part can accept.
member.value: An integer representing the largest acceptable number that the NumericRangeMaskPart can accept. The default value is 0.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.UpperMaskPart
member.summary: Represents a single character MaskPart. The character is converted to upper upon input. .

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.UpperMaskPart.ToString
member.summary: Returns the friendly name of the part.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.Ide.Common.RadInput.ProjectManagement
member.summary: Utility class for Design - Time VisualStudio.NET project management.

member.name: T:Telerik.RadInputUtils.PropertyCategory
member.summary: Defines the common property categories' names

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadControl.Version
member.summary: Gets the component's current version.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadControl.UseEmbeddedScripts
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the embedded JavaScript files or not.
member.value: True if embedded JavaScript files are to be used; otherwise false. The default value is true.
member.remarks: Use this property for debugging purposes or to apply any modifications to the JavaScript files.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.DateFormatParser
member.summary: Summary description for DateFormatParser.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.DateRangeValidation
member.summary: DateInputRangeValidation describes the method used when enforcing that the selected date is within the MinDate-MaxDate bounds.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.DateRangeValidation.Immediate
member.summary: The constraints are applied immediately. The control will not allow the user to enter a date that is outside the preset range.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.DateRangeValidation.OnBlur
member.summary: The constraints are applied when the control loses focus. It will be possible to enter a date outside the range, but it will be truncated later.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.DisplayFormatPosition
member.summary: Summary description for DisplayFormatPosition.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.NumericRangeAlign
member.summary: Numeric range alignment options

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.NumericRangeAlign.Left
member.summary: The numbers are aligned left

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.NumericRangeAlign.Right
member.summary: The numbers are aligned right

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput
member.summary: A control which ensures the date entered by the user is verified and accurate.
member.remarks: You need to set the DateFormat Property to specify the relevant format for the date. You can also specify the culture information by setting the Culture Property.

member.name: T:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl
member.summary: Abstract base class of RadMaskedTextBox and RadDateInput
member.remarks: This class is not intended for direct use.

member.name: M:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.#ctor
member.summary: This is not intended for direct use.

member.name: M:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.Focus
member.summary: Causes the control to obtain focus on page load.

member.name: M:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.GetPostBackEventReference
member.summary: This method is for internal use only, and is related to integrating r.a.d.input in composite controls.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.Skin
member.summary: Gets or sets the skin used by RadMaskedInputControl derived classes (RadMaskedTextBox and RadDateInput).
member.value: A String specifying the skin. The default value is empty string ("").
member.remarks: If the value is empty string ("") no skin is used.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.Label
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the <label> tag rendered along with RadMaskedTextBox and RadDateInput.
member.value: A string used as a label for the control. The default value is empty string ("").
member.remarks: If the value of this property has not been set, a <label> tag will not be rendered. Keep in mind that accessibility standards require labels for all input controls.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.LabelCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS class applied to the <label> tag rendered along with r.a.d.input components.
member.value: A string used specifying the CSS class of the label of the control. The default value is empty string (""). Keep in mind you should omit the "." from the name of the class.
member.remarks: This property is applicable only if the Label Property has been set.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.TextMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the behavior mode (single-line or multiline) of the control.
member.value: One of the RadInputTextBoxMode Enumeration values. The default value is SingleLine.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.HideOnBlur
member.summary: Determines wether the control should hide its prompt when losing focus, if its value is not set.
member.value: true if the prompt should be hidden; otherwise returns false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.EmptyMessage
member.summary: Specifies the message shown when the control is empty.
member.remarks: Shown if HideOnBlur Property is true and the control loses focus.
member.value: A string specifying the empty message. The default value is empty string. ("").

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.SkinsPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the relative path of the folder containing the skins.
member.example: If the skin folder is located in the project root and is named "Skins" the SkinsPath property should be set to: "~/Skins". Then you can create subfolders for individual skins e.g. Skins/Gold, Skins/Default etc.
member.value: A string specifying the relative path to the folder which contains r.a.d.input skins. The default value is "~/RadControls/Input/Skins".
member.remarks: r.a.d.input ships with a set of predefined skins which are ready to use. They are located in RadControls/Input/Skins.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.PromptChar
member.summary: Gets or sets the prompt character.
member.value: A string representing the prompt character. The default value is underscore ("_").

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.DisplayPromptChar
member.summary: Gets or sets the prompt character used by the DisplayMask.
member.value: A string representing the prompt character used in the display mask. The default value is underscore ("_").

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.ShowHint
member.summary: Enables or disables visual hints.
member.value: true if visual hints are enabled; otherwise false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.ZeroPadNumericRanges
member.summary: Enables or disables zero padding of empty digit placeholders in NumericRangeMaskParts.
member.value: true if zero padding is enabled; otherwise false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.RoundNumericRanges
member.summary: Enables rounding in NumericRangeMaskParts.
member.value: true if rounding is enabled; otherwise false. The default value is true.
member.remarks: If rounding is enabled any invalid input will be rounded to the closest value. For example if rounding is enabled and the maximum allowed value is "255", typing "9" will set the value of the NumericRangePart to 255. Otherwise the value will be set to "99".

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.AllowEmptyEnumerations
member.summary: Determines whether EnumerationMaskParts can be empty.
member.value: true if enumeration mask parts can be empty; otherwise false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of r.a.d.input components.
member.value: A string which is the raw text of the control. This is the text excluding any prompt characters and literals. However you can set any value to it - even including prompt characters or literals.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.ReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the contents of the control can be changed.
member.value: true if the control is read-only; otherwise false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.NumericRangeAlign
member.summary: Gets or sets the alignment of numeric range mask parts.
member.value: One of the NumericRangeAlign Enumeration values. The default value is Right.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.Rows
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of rows displayed in a multiline control.
member.remarks: Applicable if the TextMode property is set to Multiline.
member.value: The number of rows in a multiline control. The default is 0, which displays a one-line text box.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.Columns
member.summary: Gets or sets the display width of the control in characters.
member.remarks: Applicable if the TextMode property is set to Multiline.

value.para: The display width, in characters, of the control. The default is 0, which indicates that the property is not set.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.Wrap
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text content wraps in a multiline mode.
member.remarks: Applicable if the TextMode property is set to Multiline.

value.para: true if the text content wraps within a multiline control; otherwise, false. The default is true.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.AutoPostBack
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an automatic postback to the server will occur whenever the user modifies the text in the control and then tabs out.

value.para: true if an automatic postback to the server will occur whenever the user changes the text in the text box and then tabs out of the control; otherwise, false. The default is false.

remarks.para: Use the AutoPostBack property to specify whether an automatic postback to the server will occur whenever the user modifies the text in the control and then tabs out.
remarks.blockquote: Note Postback only occurs when the control loses focus after the contents are changed.

member.name: E:Telerik.RadInputUtils.RadMaskedInputControl.TextChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the content of the control changes between posts to the server.

remarks.para: The TextChanged event is raised when the content of the control changes between posts to the server.
remarks.blockquote: Note The control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. Be sure that view state is enabled for this control.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RadDateInput Class.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.DateFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the date format used by RadDateInput.
member.remarks: You can examine DateTimeFormatInfo class for a list of all available format characters and patterns.

example.code: Private Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles MyBase.Load RadDateInput1.DateFormat = "M/d/yyyy" 'Short date pattern. The same as "d". End Sub

member.value: A string specifying the date format used by RadDateInput. The default value is "d" (short date format).

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.DisplayDateFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the display date format used by RadDateInput. (Visible when the control is not on focus.)
member.value: A string specifying the display date format used by RadDateInput. The default value is "" (short date format). If the DisplayDateFormat is left blank, the DateFormat will be used both for editing and display.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.RadCalendarID
member.summary: Gets or sets the server ID of RadCalendar with which RadDateInput will be synchronized.
member.value: A string specifying the ID of a RadCalendar control. The default value is an empty string ("").
member.remarks: RadDateInput is searching for a RadCalendar control with the specified ID in its NamingContainer.
member.example:
This example demonstrates integration between RadDateInput and RadCalendar.
<radCln:RadCalendar id="RadCalendar1" runat="server"> </radCln:RadCalendar>
<radI:RadDateInput id="RadDateInput1" runat="server" RadCalendarID="RadCalendar1"> </radI:RadDateInput>

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.SelectedDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date content of RadDateInput.
member.value: A DateTime object that represents the selected date. The default value is MinDate.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.DbSelectedDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date content of RadDateInput in a database-friendly way.
member.value: A DateTime object that represents the selected date. The default value is MinDate.
member.remarks: This property behaves exactly like the SelectedDate property. The only difference is that it will not throw an exception if the new value is null or DBNull. Setting a null value will revert the selected date to the MinDate value.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.Culture
member.summary: Gets or sets the culture used by RadDateInput to format the date.
member.value: A CultureInfo object that represents the current culture used. The default value is System.Threading.Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentUICulture.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.OnClientDateChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets the JavaScript event handler fired whenever the date of RadDateInput changes.
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript event handling routine. The default value is empty string ("").
member.remarks:
The event handler function is called with 2 parameters:
A reference to the RadDateInput object, which triggered the event;
An event arguments object that contains the following properties:
OldDate - The old date of the RadDateInput
NewDate - The new date of the RadDateInput

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.AllowEmpty
member.summary: Enables the user to delete the date in RadDateInput.
member.value: true if the user should be able to delete the date; otherwise false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.RangeValidation
member.summary: Determines when and how the MinDate/MaxDate constraints are applied.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.ValidationDate
member.summary: This property is used by the RadDateInput's internals only. It is subject to change in the future versions. Please do not use.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.EmptyMessage
member.summary: Specifies the message shown when the date is empty.
member.remarks: Shown if AllowEmpty and HideOnBlur are true.
member.value: A string specifying the empty date message. The default value is empty string ("").

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of r.a.d.input components.
member.value: A string which is the raw text of the control. This is the text excluding any prompt characters and literals. However you can set any value to it - even including prompt characters or literals.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.MinDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the smallest date value allowed by RadDateInput.
member.value: A DateTime object that represents the smallest date value by RadDateInput. The default value is 1/1/1980.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.MaxDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the largest date value allowed by RadDateInput.
member.value: A DateTime object that represents the largest date value allowed by RadDateInput. The default value is 12/31/2099.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.IsEmpty
member.summary: Used to determine if RadDateInput is empty.
member.value: true if the date is empty (equal to MinDate); otherwise false.
member.remarks: If AllowEmpty Property is false, this property will always return false.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadDateInput.PromptChar
member.summary: Gets or sets the prompt character.
member.value: A string representing the prompt character. The default value is underscore ("_").

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox
member.summary: A text box with a mask, used to distinguish between proper and improper user input.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RadMaskedTextBox class.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox.Mask
member.summary: Gets or sets the mask format of RadMaskedTextBox.
member.value: A string specifying the mask of RadMaskedTextBox. The default value is an empty string ("").
member.remarks: When the Mask property is set the corresponding MaskPart objects are filled in the MaskParts collection of RadMaskedTextBox object. For example if you set the Mask to "#####-####" the MaskParts collection will contain 9 DigitMaskPart objects and one LiteralMaskPart object.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox.DisplayMask
member.summary: Gets or sets the mask display format of RadMaskedTextBox.
member.value: A string specifying the display mask of RadMaskedTextBox. The default value is an empty string ("").
member.remarks: If the display mask is not specified, the Mask property will be used both for display and edit format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox.DisplayFormatPosition
member.value: The display format position of RadMaskedTextBox. The default value is Left
member.summary: Determines how the value is presented when DisplayMask is Applied. Left means that the value will be shown at the left side of the mask, Right means that the value will be shown at the rightmost possible.

remarks.para: If you have a MaskedTextBox control instance with Mask set to ###### and DisplayMask set to ####.##, and you type 567 inside the textbox, DisplayFormatPosition set to Left will result in 5670.00 display after the textbox loses focus, while with Right the textbox will display 5.67.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox.TextWithPrompt
member.summary: Returns the text of the control including any prompt characters.
member.remarks: This property is read-only. To set the text of the control use the Text Property.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox.TextWithLiterals
member.summary: Returns the text of the control including any literals.
member.remarks: This property is read-only. To set the text of the control use the Text Property.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox.TextWithPromptAndLiterals
member.summary: Returns the text of the control including any literals and promt characters.
member.remarks: This property is read-only. To set the text of the control use the Text Property.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox.MaskParts
member.summary: Gets the collection of the mask parts, which compose the mask of the RadMaskedTextBox.
member.value: A MaskPartCollection containing all MaskPart objects composing the mask of RadMaskedTextBox.
member.remarks: When adding or removing items to the MaskParts property, the Mask property updates accordingly. For example if you add two DigitMaskPart objects in the MaskParts collection the Mask will be "##".

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox.DisplayMaskParts
member.summary: Gets the collection of the mask parts that compose the DisplayMask of RadMaskedTextBox.
member.value: A MaskPartCollection containing all DisplayMaskPart objects composing the display mask of RadMaskedTextBox.
member.remarks: When adding or removing items to the DisplayMaskParts property, the DisplayMask property updates accordingly. For example if you add two DigitMaskPart objects in the DisplayMaskParts collection the DisplayMask will be "##".

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox.OnClientEnumerationChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets the JavaScript event handler fired when the value of any enumeration mask part has changed.
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript event handling routine. The default value is empty string ("").
member.example:
This example demonstrates the usage of the OnClientEnumerationChanged property.
<script> function onEnumChange (input, args) { alert("Enumeration is changed to:" + args.NewValue); } </script>
<radI:RadMaskedTextBox ID="RadMaskedTextBox1" runat="server" Mask="<Mon|Tue|Wed|Thu|Fri|Sat|Sun>" OnClientEnumerationChanged="onEnumChange"> </radI:RadMaskedTextBox>

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox.OnClientMoveUp
member.summary: Gets or sets the JavaScript event handler fired when the user moves to the next value of an enumeration mask part or numeric range mask part with either keyboard arrow keys or mouse wheel.
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript event handling routine. The default value is an empty string ("").
member.example:
This example demonstrates the usage of the OnClientMoveUp property.
<script> function onMoveUp(input, args) { alert("New value is:" + args.NewValue); } </script>
<radI:RadMaskedTextBox ID="RadMaskedTextBox1" runat="server" Mask="<0..255>.<0..255>.<0..255>.<0..255>" OnClientMoveUp="onMoveUp"> </radI:RadMaskedTextBox>

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox.OnClientMoveDown
member.summary: Gets or sets the JavaScript event handler fired when the user moves to the previous value of an enumeration mask part or numeric range mask part with either keyboard arrow keys or mouse wheel.
member.example:
This example demonstrates the usage of the OnClientMoveDown property.
<script> function onMoveDown(input, args) { alert("New value is:" + args.NewValue); } </script>
<radI:RadMaskedTextBox ID="RadMaskedTextBox1" runat="server" Mask="<0..255>.<0..255>.<0..255>.<0..255>" OnClientMoveDown="onMoveDown"> </radI:RadMaskedTextBox>
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript event handling routine. The default value is an empty string ("").

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox.OnClientError
member.summary: Gets or sets the JavaScript event handler fired when the user attempts to type unacceptable symbol into RadMaskedTextBox.
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript event handling routine. The default value is empty string ("").

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox.OnClientValueChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets the JavaScript event handler fired whenever the value of RadMaskedTextBox changes.
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript event handling routine. The default value is an empty string ("").
member.example:
This example demonstrates the use of the OnClientValueChanged property.
<script> function onChange (input, args) { alert("Value changed from:" + args.OldValue + " to:" + args.NewValue); } </script>
<radI:RadMaskedTextBox ID="RadMaskedTextBox1" runat="server" Mask="<0..255>.<0..255>.<0..255>.<0..255>" OnClientValueChanged="onChange"> </radI:RadMaskedTextBox>

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadMaskedTextBox.OnClientShowHint
member.summary: Gets or sets the JavaScript event handler fired after the visual hint is shown.
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript event handling routine. The default value is an empty string ("").
